title: Y'know what I love to do in the morning? Reading tons of permabanned threads
body:
Ohhh how I love reading the hatred of these OPs from constantly spamming bullshit claims like "I was never toxic or trolling", when ironically they think it's funny to spread hatred to his teammates with toxic words & troll plays :)

It's.......it's just......

http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/591/928/94f.png

replies.body: "I spent $3k on this account and had every legendary skin this needs to be reversed immediately!"

I used to feel the same way. But the more I read those threads, the more hope I lost for the playerbase as a whole.

"Yeah, I did call my teammates f****ts 27 times in 3 games, but I don't think I'm being that toxic."
"So I told people to go kill themselves, it's not like they were actually going to do it lol."
"I was being toxic, but you should have seen the guys I was talking to. They made me toxic so it's their fault."

What ticks me off even more, is that they legitly thought that the amount of $$ they spent on their account, or their high KDA & damage dealt, is in anyway considered an "excuse" to prevent a permabanned status. It's responses like this that makes me wanna throw them a giant rock in their face.

>  It's responses like this that makes me wanna throw them a giant rock in their face.

Here's a rock {{champion:54}} 
Do et
Do et
Do et

It always bothers me when people like this are customers at my store. "Yes, you've purchased a $3000 television from us in the past 10 years, no you cannot get a refund on headphones 3 years later because they don't work."

And then they rage and 'take their business somewhere else'
how dare you call your team foots. how dare. the plural is feet.

Personally, it gives me hope.

Because they're banned, and for every toxic player banned there's one less toxic player playing the game.

Besides, society always has its bad apples, and they're almost always louder than the pleasant(?) majority. LoL doesn't have the worst community (although the new player experience is *terrible* and I'm still wondering why they haven't addressed it yet. Thornmail Ashe, anyone?).

I'd love to agree, but in most cases they just make a new account and start over with the exact same behavior.  There are a few "I actually got banned and I admit my mistakes" posts, but if you check in with people that say they're trying to reform the story is usually something along the lines of  they're trying but a lot of the time they end up giving into that rage and flaming.

"Report me, I don't care" 

...

*proceeds to cry on forums*

Things like this also made me go


https://camo.derpicdn.net/1b9be8c12d32e9c85c97ea95eb641fd2f576eff4?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.troll.me%2Fimages%2Fhey-guy%2Fand-it-felt-so-good.jpg
I prefer getting off to Rule34's League tagged entries, but each to their own.
Why not cut out the middle-man and just go to lolhentai?

> [{quoted}](name=Twiggles,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=McX83cRA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-18T16:50:34.351+0000)
>
> Why not cut out the middle-man and just go to lolhentai?

Redirect ads suck if you're on mobileâ€” that's why.
Because I follow other tags too.
It's also a guilty pleasure of mine.

It would be really shitty of you if they were actually wrongfully banned and you were laughing at them. Just keep it in mind while you are reading these posts because it is not outside the realm of possibility that Riot messed up and there was an error in their system. On another note, I don't think it's funny that people get banned for being toxic, personally I would rather have permanent chat bans if there was to be any of the such. I love this game, and I want everyone to enjoy it. Even if they are a total dick in game. IDK, just my opinions ^-^.

Wrongful bans are like... actually 1 in thousands or something like that. That figure might even be wrongful punishments. Apparently perma-bans are always reviewed by a human.

Plus, have you seen the usual "OMG WHY I GET BANNED" thread? It's pretty much always "I couldn't behave but somehow through some twisted logic it's not my fault its riot's fault"
All it was was a little murder not the whole murder. Only half a murder it's not that bad.

It's official people, this is the new hot circlejerk in the NA Boards:

**Talk shit and/or ridicule in any way possible the banned players**

http://prisonbooks.info/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/dunce_cap.jpg?w=300
"I love the smell of napalm flame in the morning."
*sniff*  "It smells like victory."
A-merica...
Best place on the forums {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Gonna add this to my morning routine.
Where do you read those? :o
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} http://static5.gamespot.com/uploads/square_avatar/1551/15516851/2941774-lfs23.png
I LOVE IT!

While i do enjoy it. I cant help but feel sad that majority of them believe what they did is suppose to be acceptable.

What really gets me though, is how they write on here, usually cursing out Riot, or the player base (for reporting them) because if you want your account back the best thing to do is use every curse word you know.

Im pretty sure (or at least hope) majority of the people who are like that are Children, because i cannot see an actual adult saying something like this, unless they are someone who is getting taken care of (probably by their parents) or has been spoiled enough to think that what ever they do shouldnt have any type of punishment. But then again this is the Human Race, and sadly we arent as Smart as we think we are. There are just way too many stupid people on this planet!

All in all im glad Riot is taking a stand against this type of behavior. its not tolerated in the real world, why would anyone think it should be in a this game/community?
I do this as well. Gets the day off to a nice start.
